select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate ,count(distinct(orderno)) as ordercnt from ordertbl
where '${sales_from}' <= to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= '${sales_to}'
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by orderdate desc

select o.orderno, s.suborderno, m.userid, m.username, s.subprice from ordertbl o join suborder s on o.orderno=s.orderno join member m on o.userid=m.userid where to_char(orderDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{param1}

select * from (select * from (select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate, count(orderno) as ordercnt, sum(totalprice) as totalsales, sum(deliveryprice) as totaldelivery from ordertbl
where orderdate between to_date('${sales_from}', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('${sales_to}', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by orderdate desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{onePageRecord} order by orderdate asc) where rownum <= #{lastPageRecord} #{onePageRecord} order by orderdate desc

select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') orderdate, count(orderno) as ordercnt, sum(totalprice-deliveryprice) as totalsales from ordertbl
where orderdate between to_date('${sales_from}', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('${sales_to}', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm') order by orderdate

select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') orderdate, count(orderno) as ordercnt, sum(totalprice-deliveryprice) as totalsales from ordertbl
where orderdate between to_date('${sales_from}', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('${sales_to}', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by orderdate

select distinct subname, sum(quantity) as quantity from (select orderdate, subno, sum(quantity) as quantity from (select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-MM') as orderdate, pno, sum(quantity) as quantity from suborder s join ordertbl o on s.orderno=o.orderno group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-MM'), pno) o join product p on o.pno=p.pno group by orderdate, subno) o join subcate s on o.subno=s.subno
where orderdate between to_date('${sales_from}', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('${sales_to}', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
group by subname

select distinct subname, sum(quantity) as quantity from (select orderdate, subno, sum(quantity) as quantity from (select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate, pno, sum(quantity) as quantity from suborder s join ordertbl o on s.orderno=o.orderno group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), pno) o join product p on o.pno=p.pno group by orderdate, subno) o join subcate s on o.subno=s.subno
where orderdate between to_date('${sales_from}', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date('${sales_to}', 'yyyy-mm-dd')+0.9999
group by subname

select distinct mainname, sum(quantity) from (select orderdate, o.subno, s.mainno, subname, quantity from (select orderdate, subno, sum(quantity) as quantity from (select to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as orderdate, pno, sum(quantity) as quantity from suborder s join ordertbl o on s.orderno=o.orderno group by to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), pno) o join product p on o.pno=p.pno group by orderdate, subno) o join subcate s on o.subno=s.subno order by orderdate desc) o join maincate m on o.mainno=m.mainno group by mainname
